attributes.action: The House of Commons should Vote on invoking Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty.
attributes.background:
On June 23rd, a referendum was held on whether the UK should remain in the EU. 
As this referendum is not legally binding, we the undersigned call upon the house to exercise its judgement, taking into account the will of the people as expressed, and vote on whether to invoke Article 50.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
